item.title: Intro
item.author: Daniel
item.description: Intro This is a personal page that I created to try my hand at blogging and technical writing. I like to tinker with tech and always had an interest in pushing the potential of older computers. I’m hoping to share share my experiences, side projects in tech that I’ve found fun and interesting. Although I’ve created pages for internal clients during my day job, it is nice to build something that will be long living and share.

item.title: Homelab Hardware
item.author: Daniel
item.description: Motivation Years ago I ran VMWare vSphere on as a VM my desktop gaming PC. It worked but it used a lot of resources and became tedious to switch whenever I wanted to do something else or startup a game. In the past few years I had embraced the cloud as I started to use it for work diving deep into AWS in my day job. In the past few years WSL and Docker Desktop saw more maturity so on Windows I no longer saw the need to run a seperate linux VM
